quote: A brave and noble book. What better thing can a person do with their own suffering than use it to help others?

cite.name: Nathan Filer, author of 'The Shock of the Fall'

quote: To merely call this a self-help book would be a complete disservice to the author. Part biography, part guide, and part Brother's Grimm Fairy Tales of the Strange… if only I had read this growing up then I might not have felt so alone.
Hughes offers a humor-filled and useful guide for anxiety… disarmingly relatable.
